title: Power China president calls on prime minister
content:
BEIJING, Oct 19 (APP): President of Power Construction Corporation China (Power China) Wang Bin on Thursday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar here.
In the meeting, they discussed in detail the Pakistan-China cooperation in the construction sector.
The prime minister appreciated the role of China particularly Power China in the infrastructural development of Pakistan.
